author: Matthew Fulton
title: Police urge bike riders to sign up to Bike Register Database to help recover lost or stolen bicycles
text: Police are calling on all bike riders to make use of a new app that aims to recover their cycles if they are stolen. The force are urging cyclists to sign up to the Bike Register Database, which already contains the details of tens of thousands of bicycles across the UK. The bank of information, used by Police Scotland for the last year, is also condensed into a downloadable app which owners are being urged to use to register their bike if it is lost or stolen. Police say there have been four incidents recently that have resulted in bikes being returned to their owners thanks to the app, with one cyclist in Edinburgh reunited with their bicycle after moving to Woking. A member of the public discovered the bike and with the phone app’s functions, was able to help the owner trace its location as it had been registered as lost. Police in the Wester Hailes area of Edinburgh say in the last two months they stepped in to return two bikes to owners through the app after they had been handed in to a police station with both being registered on the database as stolen. The app allows users to scan a barcode or enter property details to find out the status of the bike, whether it is lost or stolen and details about the owner. The force say with a number of new bikes likely purchased as Christmas gifts, riders should take advantage of the new features to log their details. Inspector Jordan Low from Police Scotland’s Rural and Acquisitive Crime Team, said: “We know that for many in Scotland, bikes are not just an important recreational item, they are a vital mode of transportation or exercise and to have them lost or stolen can be devastating. “I would ask that all bike owners ensure their bicycles’ details are logged on the Bike Register database, as this will aid us during our inquiries whenever we locate any bikes that we believe to be stolen, or that are brought into police stations as lost property. “The recent successful recoveries highlight just how important the database is in order to reunite bikes with their rightful owners and the app available to officers on their mobile device is another useful tool in helping us tackle bike theft across the country.” STV News is now on WhatsApp Get all the latest news from around the country [Follow STV News](https://www.whatsapp.com/channel/0029VaCESJzKgsNvKKNOYO2r) Follow STV News on WhatsApp Scan the QR code on your mobile device for all the latest news from around the country

author: Holly Marie Moore
title: How St. Paul fire officials rescue man trapped underground for days
text:
St. Paul fire officials said they used a rope system to rescue a man Tuesday after he reported being trapped in an underground vault for several days, MPR News reports. Authorities said the man reported falling into the vault — which may have had a tampered cover — while walking in the area on the Fourth of July. A passerby heard him calling for help on Tuesday and called 911.
As Children’s Dental Health Services prepares to open its new location in Rochester, the site, which serves low-income families, is paying attention to nationwide health care uncertainty, KTTC says. Organization representatives have said families may face challenges to receiving Medical Assistance in the future.
Duluth’s Amazon facility is tackling its first Amazon Prime Days, WDIO writes. After having its official launch in June, the Amazon shipping facility in Duluth experienced its first busy season for the company. Amazon Prime Days are July 8-11.
KARE 11 reports Minneapolis announced it will grant $700,000 to 65 projects across the city’s seven cultural districts. The Cultural Districts Arts Fund is a fairly new initiative that is a part of a broader 2040 comprehensive plan. This year’s funds will support a wide range of projects, such as festivals, pop-ups, creative activations, cultural venues, and events.

author: Canadian Press
title: Princess Anne lays wreath at B.C. veteran's cemetery; receives 21-gun salute
text:
ESQUIMALT, B.C. — Princess Anne paid tribute to veterans buried at a cemetery in British Columbia today, laying a wreath to honour the more than 2,500 military personnel and family members buried there.
The princess spent more than an hour touring the God's Acre cemetery, a national historic site in Esquimalt, B.C., that dates back to 1868.
The visit to the secluded, tree-covered cemetery is part of her three-day visit to B.C., which started Friday at North Vancouver with her participation in the commissioning of the first Arctic patrol vessel for Canada's Pacific fleet.
The princess was on board HMCS Max Bernays early Saturday when it entered the fleet's home base in Esquimalt Harbour to the greeting of a 21-gun salute.
Her tour will see her attend a commemorative service on Sunday for the Battle of the Atlantic, which will take place at the B.C. legislature.
Princess Anne, the sister of King Charles, is also scheduled to visit the Royal Victoria Yacht Club and members of the Victoria Therapeutic Riding Association later in the day.
This report by The Canadian Press was first published May 4, 2024.
The Canadian Press

author: Andrea Piva
title: Paolo Bonolis: ecco quanto guadagna il conduttore di Mediaset
text:
Ecco quanto guadagna Paolo Bonolis: è uno dei conduttori più amati della televisione italiana e i suoi programmi sono spesso un successo. Uno dei conduttori televisivi più amati dal pubblico è, senza ombra di dubbio, Paolo Bonolis . I suoi programmi, sia quelli sui canali Mediaset che quelli sulla Rai, si sono quasi sempre rivelati dei grandi successi, questo anche per la capacità del conduttore di attirare il pubblico grazie alla propria simpatia. Dopo gli esordi a Bim Bum Bam lo abbiamo visto a Tira & Molla, Striscia la notizia, Affari Tuoi, Domenica In, Ciao Darwin e molti altri. Certo, va detto, il suo stile di conduzione non piace a tutti e negli anni è stato al centro di diverse polemiche, anche per i suoi cachet. Ma quanto guadagna Paolo Bonolis? Vediamolo insieme.
Quanto guadagna Paolo Bonolis Le ultime notizie certe riguardo gli stipendi percepiti da Paolo Bonolis risalgono al 2019, quando ha rinnovato il contratto con Mediaset : il conduttore guadagna circa 10 milioni di euro all’anno . Ricordiamo che Paolo Bonolis lo possiamo vedere alla guida del quiz show Avanti un altro (che conduce dal 2011).
Paolo Bonolis Lo stipendio percepito da Paolo Bonolis è certamente aumentando nel corso degli anni, basti pensare che nel 2005, quando tornò sui canali Mediaset dopo gli anni alla Rai, firmò un contratto che prevedeva uno stipendio da 8,5 milioni di euro all’anno. Non che il suo precedente contratto con Mediaset, risalente al 1998, fosse molto diverso: all’epoca il suo compenso era di 18 miliardi di lire , diventati poi 12 miliardi nel 2001.
Certo Paolo Bonolis è uno dei presentatori più pagati del panorama televisivo italiano ma, allo stesso tempo (come abbiamo detto anche in precedenza) è anche uno dei più apprezzati e i suoi programmi fanno sempre registrare ottimi dati di ascolto, che generano grandi introiti pubblicitari.

author: Nouvelles
title: Coupe du monde féminine des moins de 20 ans avec BiblioRed à Bogotá
text:
La Coupe du Monde Féminine U-20 de la FIFA, Colombie 2024 se déroulera du 31 août au 22 septembre. dans trois villes de notre pays, Bogota étant l’épicentre avec ses deux stades principaux : Nemesio Camacho – El Campín et le Metropolitano de Techo pendant les trois semaines du concours.
Le Stade Nemesio Camacho – El Campín accueillera deux matchs de l’équipe nationale colombienne en plus de nombreuses autres sélections ; et là se jouera la grande finale de la compétition. Alors que 14 matches se joueront à l’Estadio Metropolitano de Techo, dont certains des huitièmes de finale. Karla Viancha de Bogota fera partie de l’équipe nationale.
La fête du football féminin dans la capitale colombienne nous rappelle que Bogota est le berceau d’athlètes exceptionnels et a accueilli d’importantes compétitions qui mettent en valeur ses infrastructures et l’esprit sportif des citoyens. Par conséquent, le L’Institut régional des loisirs et des sports souligne la Coupe du monde comme une source de fierté pour la ville.
Avec le nouvelle exposition ‘Time out : littérature et sport à Bogotá’ de la Bibliothèque numérique de Bogota Vous pourrez explorer les différents aspects du sport de la capitale à travers les archives historiques et dans la voix de ses protagonistes.
Le football occupe justement une place à part dans le exposition numérique où est raconté ce sport, son lien avec la production littéraire et comment il est étroitement lié à la vie urbaine et à l’identité de la capitale. Ainsi, avec l’histoire du joueur Natalia Gaitán de Bogota l’un des footballeurs les plus importants de l’histoire récente du football colombien, se construit la mémoire de la façon dont les footballeurs de la ville se distinguent dans différents scénarios sportifs.
De cette façon, nous connaissons l’histoire du joueur qui a joué dans différents clubs aux États-Unis, en Espagne et au Mexique ; et qui est actuellement en Santa Fe de Bogota indépendante où elle a été récemment vice-championne de la Ligue féminine et rêve de la Copa Libertadores.
Dans son entretien, Natalia Gaitán raconte comment elle s’est impliquée dans le football, les problèmes de santé auxquels elle a été confrontée dans son enfance et comment elle est passée du statut de seule fille à pratiquer ce sport dans son environnement à celui de trouver un club Internacional de Bogotá, où il a commencé sa formation dans le football.
Il mentionne également son processus dans Equipe nationale féminine de Colombie à partir de 16 ans et sa participation à divers tournois internationaux de diverses catégories et son rôle de capitaine lors de la Coupe du monde 2015.
Dans son récit, Gaitán nous transmet la fierté de représentent le drapeau jaune et rouge de Bogota et mentionne en quoi consiste cette compétence sportive qui caractérise les footballeurs de Bogotá.
De même, il fait référence aux mesures prises pour que les filles aient désormais des références dans le sport, notamment dans le football ; et met en lumière les réalisations visant à réduire l’écart entre le football masculin et féminin depuis l’évolution du sport.

author: Square1
title: Warnings of significant snow accumulations this weekend
text:
After a bitterly cold evening across the country, a status yellow low temperature weather warning will remain in effect until 11am this morning. We get the latest on the situation with the weather with Rebecca Cantwell who is a Forecaster with Met Eireann.
[Uncategorized](https://www.newstalk.com/uncategorized)
